channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- DW Question Answer Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- DW Question Answer Pro

item.title: CVE-2021-24800|2024-08-03T19:42:17.205Z -- unknown -- dw%20question%20answer%20pro
item.description: The DW Question & Answer Pro WordPress plugin through 1.3.4 does not check that the comment to edit belongs to the user making the request, allowing any user to edit other comments.

item.title: CVE-2021-24805|2024-08-03T19:42:17.212Z -- unknown -- dw%20question%20answer%20pro
item.description: The DW Question & Answer Pro WordPress plugin through 1.3.4 does not properly check for CSRF in some of its functions, allowing attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions, such as update a comment or a question status.
